title: Feelings Buried Alive Never Die...
description: Karol Truman has brought together in one book, Feelings Buried Alive Never Die . . . the best of the best. She not only tells you why you feel the way you feel, but how these feelings all started. She then goes on to tell you how YOU can easily transform undesirable feelings so that they no longer hinder your growth. What a gift!
author: Karol K. Truman
